entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:12 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
